actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Conservation Credit and Rural Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, and Rural Development

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives opposing the elimination of the Rural Electrification Administration loan programs and restrictive lending criteria; and that it will work to preserve them in order that the rural electric cooperatives can adequately serve their member-consumers.

summary.text: States that the House of Representatives: (1) opposes the elimination of the Rural Electrification Administration loan programs and restrictive lending criteria; and (2) will work to preserve such programs and lending criteria.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives opposing the elimination of the Rural Electrification Administration loan programs and restrictive lending criteria; and that it will work to preserve them in order that the rural electric cooperatives can adequately serve their member-consumers.
